metadata.title: CVE-2022-2622 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Safe Browsing in GoogleChrome on Windows prior to 104.0.5112.79 allowed a remote attacker tobypass download restrictions via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
